flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=180>>180 RSVP
Of those only 180*0.8=<<180*0.8=414>>414 people showed up
So only 414-10=<<414-10=404>>404 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.
#### 404

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 144, not 414. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
